hero.name: Hasan Elahi
hero.description: Full-stack developer with expertise in UI/UX design and machine learning. Currently assisting in Advanced ML courses at NMBU while pursuing a Master's in Data Science. I specialize in building modern applications and developing intelligent solutions.

ta_nmbu.title: Teaching Assistant
ta_nmbu.description: Teaching DAT200 (Advanced Machine Learning) and INF230 (Data Handling and Analysis). Assisting students with Python, ML frameworks, and MySQL.

intern_kartverket.title: Software Engineer Internship
intern_kartverket.description: Conducted stakeholder interviews, designed UI/UX in Figma, and modernized Norgeskart website using React and Tailwind CSS. Built reusable component library with Storybook.

upwork.title: Full-Stack Developer & ML Engineer
upwork.description: Providing full-stack development and UI/UX services. Training ML algorithms and developing APIs for backend services.

tarabut.title: Associate ML Engineer
tarabut.description: Managed annotation of textual and image datasets for machine learning. Collaborated on data labeling process improvements.

patent.title: Patent Engineer
patent.description: Contributed to patent filings for Microsoft and Huawei. Analyzed technical documents related to AI.

masters.title: Master's Degree in Data Science
masters.description: Currently pursuing advanced studies in data science and machine learning.

bachelors.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science
bachelors.description: CGPA: 3.59/4.0. Thesis: Classification of Brain Tumour Using Deep Learning.

elahi_ui.title: Elahi UI - React Component Library
elahi_ui.description: Published a production-ready React component library with 15+ accessible components. Features full TypeScript support, dark/light mode theming, comprehensive Storybook documentation, and WCAG accessibility compliance. Available on NPM with tree-shakeable architecture for optimal bundle size.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Built a modern, responsive portfolio website using React and TypeScript. Features internationalization (i18n) with English and Norwegian language support, dark/light theme switching, smooth animations, and fully responsive design. Showcases projects, skills, and professional journey with an intuitive user interface.

kartverket.title: Kartverket UI Library
kartverket.description: Modernized Norway's national mapping agency website by conducting stakeholder interviews, designing in Figma, and building a reusable React component library with Storybook documentation. Implemented responsive design with Tailwind CSS.

brain_tumour.title: Brain Tumour Classification
brain_tumour.description: Developed a deep learning model for classifying brain tumours using medical imaging data. Implemented using PyTorch and achieved high accuracy in tumor detection and classification.

annotation.title: ML Data Annotation Platform
annotation.description: Built and managed a data annotation platform for machine learning datasets. Improved labeling efficiency and data quality through collaborative workflows and automated validation.

fullstack_client.title: Full-Stack Client Projects
fullstack_client.description: Delivered multiple full-stack web applications for clients through Upwork. Integrated APIs, built responsive UIs, and implemented machine learning features for various business needs.

contact.title: Get In
contact.intro: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out!
